author: Odeinoichus
title: And the World Wrestling Champion is...
review:
Set #71011 Wrestling Champion: We've reached the final member of the male characters from Series 15, the Wrestling Champion is one of the weakest offerings in my opinion, not because of what he is, but because he isn't as impressive as the other figures in the Series. One of them inevitably becomes the lowest one on the totem and in this case I fear Wrestling Champion just doesn't do enough to stand out.

While he may be a weak link he's definitely not unimpressive to look at as far as the printing and detail work is concerned. He's sporting a pair of light blue trunks on his dual-molded legs and includes a championship belt on his bare-chested torso. The torso is dual-sided and features side-printing on the arms for some fancy looking straps. He has a teeth gritting expression as he holds his trophy accessory up triumphantly and features the first ever LEGO mullet, a great hair piece.

Overall I'd mildly recommend this one if you're a wrestling fan, if not he's safe to skip unless you want a complete set of sixteen.
